prompt: What type of animal is recognized for its sharp recollection abilities?
icl_complete: One animal widely recognized for its sharp recollection abilities is the dolphin. Dolphins are highly intelligent creatures known for their long-term memory. They can remember the sounds of specific individuals for many years, even after long periods of separation. Such advanced cognitive functions make dolphins some of the most memory-capable animals in the animal kingdom.
